Name:
USS Crowninshield
HMS Chelsea
HMCS Chelsea
Derzkiy (Insolent)
Fate:
Transferred to UK, 9 September 1940
Transferred to USSR, 16 July 1944
Returned to United Kingdom, 26 December 1943
Returned to UK for scrapping, 23 June 1949
Notes: Transferred to Royal Canadian Navy November 1942; returned by Canada 26 December 1943
Armament:
4 × 4"/50 caliber guns
12 × 21 inch (533 mm) torpedo tubes
